caption.p: Effects of E. intisy EO on intracellular accumulation of doxorubicin in HL-60R cell line. Representative example of flow cytometry analysis of intracellular accumulation of doxorubicin (1 μg/mL) after different time of incubation (30 min, 1 h and 2 h) in HL-60R cells pre-treated with 15 μg/mL of E. intisy essential oil or verapamil 10 μM for 24 h.
